TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ScrollViewer extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.

span.span: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可讓要比實際大小較小的區域中顯示內容。A enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size. 當內容不是完全可見，顯示捲軸，使用者可以使用移動內容區域是可見的。When the content of the is not entirely visible, the displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible. 包含所有的內容區域是範圍。The area that includes all of the content of the is the extent. 內容的可見區域是在檢視區。The visible area of the content is the viewport. 實體捲動可用來依預先決定的實體遞增值 (通常是以像素為單位宣告的值) 捲動內容。Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels. 邏輯捲動可用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 實體捲動是預設的捲動行為，適用於大部分項目。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. 如果您包含大量的項目，可能會受到影響捲動的效能。If your contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected. 在此案例中，設定至`true`。In this case, set to `true`. 這會導致在拖曳時仍維持靜態內容的檢視並更新時，才釋放。This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the and to update only when the is released. 因為捲軸的元素定義於預設樣式的項目，如果您套用自訂樣式，將不再出現捲軸。Because the scroll bars for a element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a . 捲軸必須定義要顯示的自訂樣式中。Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear. ## 自訂 ScrollViewer 控制項Customizing the ScrollViewer Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[ScrollViewer 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollviewer-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含一些文字和矩形。The following example creates a that contains some text and a rectangle. 只需要使用時，就會顯示捲軸列。The scroll bars appear only when they are needed. 調整視窗大小時，捲軸出現，並會消失。When you resize the window, the scroll bars appear and disappear. [!code-cpp[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/CPP/ScrollViewer_wcp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/CSharp/ScrollViewer_wcp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/VisualBasic/ScrollViewer.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[ScrollViewer#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollViewer/XAML/Pane1.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanContentScroll { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanContentScroll : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the interface are allowed to scroll.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the interface are allowed to scroll.

value.span: 如果捲動以邏輯單位。如果捲動實體單位。

span.span: if the scrolls in terms of logical units; if the scrolls in terms of physical units.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的內容可以捲動，即實體單位或邏輯單元。Content in a can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units. 實體的單位是裝置無關的像素。Physical units are device independent pixels. 邏輯單元用於捲動內的項目。Logical units are used for scrolling items within an . 預設行為是要用來捲動內容的實體單位。The default behavior of the is to use physical units to scroll its content. 不過，萬一其中設`true`，內容可以捲動，使用邏輯單元。However, in cases where the is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll. 例如， ， ，和繼承自其他控制項使用可捲動的邏輯單元。For example, , , and other controls that inherit from use logical units to scroll. 如果是`true`，值， ， ，和屬性是數字的項目，而不是實體的單位。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items, instead of physical units. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`. 實體捲動是預設的捲動行為，適用於大部分項目。Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most elements. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. [!code-csharp[scrollchangedeventargsLayout#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollchangedeventargsLayout/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[scrollchangedeventargsLayout#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollchangedeventargsLayout/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]

summary.span: Gets the horizontal offset of the visible content.

span.span: Gets the horizontal offset of the visible content.
The horizontal offset of the visible content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`，內容會捲動，當使用者放開的。When is `true`, the content is scrolled when the user releases the of the . 當使用者拖曳、值不會變更。When the user drags the , the value does not change. 當使用者放開，更新目前值。When the user releases the , updates to the current value. 當是`false`，當使用者拖曳捲動瀏覽內容。When is `false`, the content is scrolled when the user drags the . 在此情況下，會一律等於。In this case, is always equal to .

public: property double HorizontalOffset { double get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.

span.span: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
A that represents the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正值會對應到左側的位移的內容。A positive value corresponds to the content being offset to the left. 有效值介於零和減去。Valid values are between zero and the minus the . 傳回的值將說明與裝置無關的像素。The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels. 從.NET Framework 3.5 SP1 版時是`true`，持續地變更為使用者拖曳，但內容檢視不會變更直到釋放。Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when is `true`, continues to change as the user drags the , but the content view doesn't change until the is released. 在此情況下，表示可見內容的位移和表示內容為基礎的位移位置。In this case, represents the visible content offset and represents the content offset based on the position. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示項目數量龐大，可能會造成效能問題。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 在此情況下，它可能有助於使用延後的捲動。In this case, it might be useful to use deferred scrolling. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[最佳化效能： 控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)。For more information, see [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md). 這個屬性可以當做執行個體屬性和附加的屬性。This property can be used as an instance property and an attached property. ## Examples 下列範例所示與屬性設定為`true`。The following example shows a with the property set to `true`. [!code-xaml[DeferredScrolling#DeferredScrolling](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DeferredScrolling/xaml/window1.xaml#deferredscrolling)]

summary.span: Scrolls the content downward by one line.

span.span: Scrolls the content downward by one line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個方法不會不產生任何捲動行為是`null`。This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if is `null`. 邏輯捲動用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 這不同於實體捲動，其中定義實體的增量，以指定的方向捲動內容。This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: Required arguments for this event.

span.span: Required arguments for this event.

summary.span: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.

span.span: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辨識下列的鍵盤輸入：The following keyboard input is recognized: - 向左箭號： 內容捲動至左的一行。The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left. - 向右鍵： 內容捲動一行右邊。The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right. - 向上鍵： 將內容向上捲動一行。The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line. - 向下鍵： 將內容向下捲動一行。The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line. - PAGE UP： 捲動到目前的頁面頂端的內容。PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page. - PAGE DOWN： 捲動至目前頁面底部的內容。PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page. - 首頁： 捲動至第一頁頂端的內容。HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page. - 結束： 捲動內容的最後一頁的底部。END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double PanningDeceleration { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.PanningDeceleration : double with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the rate slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.

span.span: Gets or sets the rate slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.

value.span: 速率中會變慢 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 每平方毫秒。

span.span: The rate slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者捲動藉由使用觸控，使用者將手指放在將手指移短的距離，畫面上，然後以測量時手指移動。When a user scrolls the by using touch, the user puts a finger on the , moves the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then lifts the finger while it is moving. 這個結果是會持續移動之後使用者提開手指。The result of this is that the will continue to move after the user lifts the finger. 屬性指定後使用者取消手指捲動會變慢的速率。The property specifies the rate the scrolling slows after the user lifts the finger.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::PanningMode PanningMode { System::Windows::Controls::PanningMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::PanningMode value); };
member this.PanningMode : System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the way reacts to touch manipulation.

span.span: Gets or sets the way reacts to touch manipulation.

value.span: 值，指定如何要碰觸操作的回應。

span.span: A value that specifies how reacts to touch manipulation.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定是否捲動水平、 垂直或兩者。The property specifies whether the scroll horizontally, vertically, or both. 會在使用者拖曳手指支援 Windows 觸控的觸控式裝置上的控制項上時所捲動。The will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch. 可以是任一組直接依據或做為附加屬性。 can be either set directly on a or used as an attached property. 當控制項包含中其，使用為附加至指定的行為屬性中。When a control contains a in its , use as an attached property to specify the behavior of the in the . 當您使用之外，將直接依據。When you use a outside of a , set directly on the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立並將數個項目加入其中。The following example creates a and adds several elements to it. 在此範例中，當視窗大小變更時，大小`textblock1`也會變更。In this example, when the size of the window changes, the size of `textblock1` also changes. 當太小，無法顯示所有內容，會變成可捲動。When the is too small to display all of the content, the becomes scrollable. 範例會設定至，讓使用者可以向上捲動水平及垂直地使用手指。The example sets to so that the user can scroll the horizontally and vertically by using a finger. [!code-xaml[ScrollViewerPanning#PanningModeDirect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollviewerpanning/CS/mainwindow.xaml#panningmodedirect)] 下列範例會建立並用為附加屬性。The following example creates a and uses as an attached property. 根據預設中的具有其至。By default the in the of a has its to . 這是讓使用者水平移動手指日前垂直，使用者會反白顯示文字。This is so that when the user moves a finger horizontally before moving it vertically, the user highlights text. 範例會設定至，讓使用者無法使用手指選取文字。The example sets to so that the user cannot select text by using a finger. 請注意，至也會防止使用者選取的文字。Note that setting to also prevents the user from selecting text. 範例會設定屬性，因此不需要水平捲軸。The example sets the property to , so horizontal scrolling is not necessary. [!code-xaml[ScrollViewerPanning#PanningModeAttached](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/scrollviewerpanning/CS/mainwindow.xaml#panningmodeattached)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.

span.span: Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.

value.span: 捲動位移轉譯操作位移的比率。

span.span: The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者拖曳手指跨物件時，它會被視為轉譯操作。When a user drags a finger across an object, it is considered a translate manipulation. 捲動中使用該操作。The uses that manipulation to scroll. 屬性會指定多少捲動每一單位的轉譯。The property specifies how much the scrolls for each unit of translation. 例如，如果為 2，會捲動 2[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]的每個[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]翻譯操作。For example, if is 2, the will scroll 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] for every [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] of the translate manipulation.

summary.span: Scrolls vertically to the beginning of the content.

span.span: Scrolls vertically to the beginning of the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個方法不會不產生任何捲動行為是`null`。This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if is `null`. 邏輯捲動用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 這不同於實體捲動，其中定義實體的增量，以指定的方向捲動內容。This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝主機中的項目並設定其屬性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示項目數量龐大，可能會造成效能問題。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 在此情況下，它可能有助於使用延後的捲動。In this case, it might be useful to use deferred scrolling. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[最佳化效能： 控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)。For more information, see [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticalOffset As Double
public: property double VerticalOffset { double get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.

span.span: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.

value.span: A ，代表捲動內容的垂直位移。

span.span: A that represents the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正值會對應到內容上方的位移。A positive value corresponds to the content being offset to the top. 有效值介於零和減去。Valid values are between zero and the minus the . 如果是`true`，值， ， ，和屬性是數字的項目。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items. 如果是`false`，這些屬性的值會與裝置無關的像素。If is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels. 從.NET Framework 3.5 SP1 版時是`true`，持續地變更為使用者拖曳，但內容檢視不會變更直到釋放。Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when is `true`, continues to change as the user drags the , but the content view doesn't change until the is released. 在此情況下，表示可見內容的位移和表示內容為基礎的位移位置。In this case, represents the visible content offset and represents the content offset based on the position. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ViewportHeight As Double
public: property double ViewportHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the content's viewport.

span.span: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the content's viewport.

value.span: A ，代表內容檢視區的垂直大小。

span.span: A that represents the vertical size of the content's viewport.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視區是內容的可見區域。The viewport is the visible area of the content. 是只輸出屬性;它可以有效地設定藉由指定的內容項目。 is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the of the content element. 如果是`true`，值， ， ，和屬性是數字的項目。If is `true`, the values of the , , , and properties are number of items. 如果是`false`，這些屬性的值會與裝置無關的像素。If is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
